original_text: Then the peoples around them set out to discourage the people of Judah and make them afraid to go on building.
korean_text: 이로부터 그 땅 백성이 유다 백성의 손을 약하게 하여 그 건축을 방해하되

sentences.original_text: Then the peoples around them set out
to discourage the people of Judah
and make them afraid to go on building
sentences.korean_translation: 건축을 계속하는 것을 두려워하게 하려고 했다
